text: Archibald Denny McKenzie (1 May 1863 – 1946) was a Scottish professional footballer who played as an inside forward for clubs including Clyde, SunderlandArchie McKenzie, The StatCat and West Bromwich Albion.Player Archive M, Albion Till We Die ==References== Category:1863 births Category:1946 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Greenock Category:Scottish footballers Category:Association football inside forwards Category:Clyde F.C. players Category:Millwall F.C. players Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:West Bromwich Albion F.C. players Category:Portsmouth F.C. players Category:Dumbarton F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Scottish Football League players Category:Date of death missing
title: Archibald McKenzie (footballer)
